name: Twiddle - let's play
description:
"Do you love board games and other games you can play with friends? If so, then you'll love "Twiddle - let's play", a free Community App created by Spieleverlage e.V.

Keep up to date and connect with thousands of board game players. Organize games evenings, participate in game events and get details on the latest board games, parlour games and card games.
"Twiddle - let's play" brings together players and publishers of board games, as well as organizers of game events.
- Link up with other players, chat with them and get to know new friends.
- Organize or take part in games evenings and events
- Always get the latest news from the world of board and parlour games, straight onto your Smartphone.
- Find games cafes, places which lend you games and games events in your area.
- The map and navigation tools are clear and easy to use. They'll help you to find your desired location as quickly as possible.

Download "Twiddle - let's play" now for free - straight onto your Smartphone or Tablet - and enter the wonderful world of board games and other game played in groups.
